unnormalised: Arrey yaar, this cybersecurity thing is a real chakkar, no? normalised: Arrey yaar, this cyber security thing is a real chakkar, no? My cousin Suresh downloaded some free "Bollywood movie" from a shady website, and now his laptop is slower than a bullock cart! He's complaining, "Bhai, my bank details are hacked or what?" Told him, "Suresh, you invited the cyber chor yourself! Next time, stick to Netflix, even if it costs rupee five hundred a month. Or maybe just stick to watching Doordarshan, safe and sound!"
